sentence.text: Shared facial features are a broad and wide forehead, similar shape of the eyes with long palpebral fissures, a bulbous biological_process of the nose and thick lips.

Of these five genes, the brain expressed peptidyl-serine phosphorylation gene constitutes a good candidate for the developmental delay, while the cellular homeostasis gene, involved in mitochondrial trafficking, might underlie the hypotonia and the excessive fatigue
